channel.title: Stargate Atlantis on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in Stargate Atlantis on jverkamp.com

item.title: Stargate Atlantis: Season 2
item.description: Well that’s quite a beginning and ending, with a whole lot in between. One of the biggest changes is the introduction of Ronan Dex. Replacement for Lt. Ford who has a tendency to shoot first and ask questions–well, never. He’s quite the character and a good addition to the team. Interesting that the main team is half from Pegasus now. Mini-reviews (potential spoilers): Siege, Part 3: Man this is a fun three parter.

item.title: Stargate Atlantis: Season 1
item.description: And so it begins again. While Stargate SG-1 really has a solid place in my heart, in a way I like Atlantis even better. I don’t think it could have been what it is without SG-1, but with it, it’s made even better. You have a generally optimistic can do attitude, backed up by McKay quite often saving the day (which is crazy coming off SG-1, I forgot how annoying he is and just how much he grows throughout the seasons of Atlantis).
